Class ActionSiteGenerator

java.lang.Object
org.nasdanika.html.model.app.gen.SiteGenerator
org.nasdanika.html.model.app.gen.ActionSiteGenerator
public class ActionSiteGenerator extends SiteGenerator
Generates a web site from an action model as a semantic model.
Author:
Pavel

    • isDeleteOutputPath

      protected boolean isDeleteOutputPath(String path)
      Clean predicate for the output directory. This implementation returns true. Override to return false for paths which shall not be cleaned (deleted).
      Parameters:
      path - File/directory path in the output directory.
      Returns:
